revised_title: Palaeontology and Palaeoenvironmental Analysis of the 1985 Tibet Geotraverse
tldr: The authors present a detailed analysis of the geological and palaeontological findings from the 1985 Tibet Geotraverse, focusing on the biostratigraphy, palaeoenvironments, and biogeographical data. They provide crucial evidence for dating various strata and terranes, constructing a framework for understanding the evolution of the Tibetan plateau and its surrounding regions.
